pages.title: Advanced Spells
pages.text: A compendium of all the spells the advanced turtlemancer wand can cast. $(br2)(This wand can also perform the apprentice and intermediate spells).

pages.title: Bubble Leviosa III
pages.text: It last longer. Also, it heals more.

pages.title: Self Bubble Leviosa III
pages.text: Pressing $(k:turtlemancy.selfbubble) you can get Bubble Leviosa III applied to yourself.

pages.title: Turtles Defense III
pages.text: Use the wand while sneaking to get $(thing)Resistance III$() at the cost of getting $(thing)Slowness I$().

pages.title: Cow Burst
pages.text: Use the wand against a cow to make it explode. Yeah. Turtles hate cows too (no more than chickens though). Why? I don't know. Maybe becouse they are so big, racist and make awful sounds. Explode cows and get a lot of leather.

pages.title: Common Block Removal
pages.text: Use the wand against common blocks to instantly remove them (without drops). This spell works with:$(li)Any stone block$(li)Diorite and Andesite$(li)Cobblestone$(li)Sand and any Sandstone$(li)Dirt$(li)Netherrack$(li)End stones

pages.title: Bedrock Breaker
pages.text: Turtlemancers are really powerful. $(br2)Turtlemancers are so powerful that if they use their full power against a bedrock block they can pick up...$(br)a little fragment of it.

pages.title: Ice Picker
pages.text: Use the wand against $(item)Ice$(), $(item)Packed Ice$() or $(item)Blue Ice$() to pick it.
